message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $90 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $100 to see if we can find common ground. Let's keep talking.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still not able to meet at $100, but I would like to propose $95 as my maximum offer for the product.
